title: 快捷菜单插件一用就崩客户端
author: 科学坑
txt_content: 如题，快捷菜单右键立马崩端，设置item是闹钟，设置成别的试过也不行，报错如下：Exception in thread "Ops Check" Exception in thread "Version Check" Exception in thread "Beta Tester Check" Exception in thread "Message Check" Exception in thread "Version Check" Exception in thread "Sub MSG Check" Exception in thread "NEI Item Loading Operation Timer" AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed

replies.txt_content: 请问用什么插件呢。能否加个qq我帮你，2521530287

replies.author: 小cheng
replies.txt_content: 请问lz用的什么端，什么菜单插件

replies.author: 都市小怪兽
replies.txt_content: 插件报错 推荐删除配置文件重新加载配置

replies.author: 都市小怪兽
replies.txt_content: 还有AIP与插件版本记得对上号
